Class GeneAnnotator

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent
public class GeneAnnotator
extends org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase

Gene TAG Annotator. It uses the Ling Pipe toolkit to perform Gene TAG Annotation. The model that we are using for this implementation is called pos-en-bio-medpost.HiddenMarkovModel. It is trained on GenTAG dataset and uses a Hidden Markov Model for named entity recognition. The model can be downloaded from here http://alias-i.com/lingpipe/demos/models/ne-en-bio-genetag.HmmChunker
